transcripts.text: The beauty queen.  Jane Kennedy was born in 1951 in Washington,  D.C.,  but she was raised in Ohio.  In 1970, she became the first black woman in history to win Miss Ohio, and she also finished in the top five in the national USA contest.  She married Leon Isaac in 1971.  She went on to star in numerous reality shows such as the Dean Martin Reality Show, and she also starred in numerous movies throughout the 1970s.  Her big break came in 1976 when she became the first woman in history to become announcer on the NFL Today Show.  She went on to host her own sports show called The Greatest Sports Legends.  where she interviewed Muhammad Ali, she interviewed Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, she interviewed Michael Jordan, she interviewed some of the greatest sports legends in the history of sports.  She continued modeling throughout the 1980s, appearing in shows like The Love Boat, and she starred in the movie Body and Soul with her husband, Leon Isaac.  She ended up divorcing her husband in 1982. and she went on to marry Bill Overton in 1985.  After she got married and started having kids, she chose to walk away from the limelight.  Now, in the 80s and the 70s, Jane Kennedy was looked at as the most beautiful, glamorous woman in America.  She was looked at as the most beautiful black woman in America, the most famous black woman in America.  She was like Beyonce of the 1970s.  So to see her walk away from the limelight and walk away from fame had to really take a lot of courage for her to do that.  But she chose to walk away from fame and walk away from the limelight to be a stay-at-home mom and raise her four kids.  Today, she's 67 years old.  And I think she looks great for her age.  She's done a lot of charity work.  She's kept busy by doing a lot of things to inspire people to do the right things and be positive.  I'm just glad that she's still alive and healthy.  A lot of people have different opinions about this topic.  Leave a comment, rate and subscribe.
